alert.note: Alert for Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 2:25PM CST until January 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. North winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Woodford County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Saturday to 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility will be reduced by snow and gusty winds. Dangerously cold temperatures are expected by early Sunday morning, with wind chills below zero.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
